Jere Kahanpaeae
; individualCount: 1 ; sex: female ; Taxon: scientificName: Micromorphusclaripennis; order: Diptera; family: Dolichopodidae; scientificNameAuthorship: (Strobl, 1899); Location: country: Finland ; stateProvince: V; municipality: Karjaa; locality: Mustio ; verbatimCoordinates: 667368:332560; verbatimCoordinateSystem: ykj; decimalLatitude: 60.138 ; decimalLongitude: 23.858 ; geodeticDatum: WGS84; coordinatePrecision: 50; Identification: identifiedBy: Jere Kahanpaeae ; Event: samplingProtocol: sweep netting ; eventDate: 2006-6-20 ; Record Level: collectionID: http://id.luomus.fi/HR.110; institutionCode: MZH ; collectionCode: Diptera Fennica ; basisOfRecord: PreservedSpecimen

New to Finland. Previously known from NW Russia, Germany and Spain ( Bellstedt et al. 1999 ,
Carles-Tolra Hjort-Andersen 2002
,
Kahanpaeae and Winqvist 2005
). As the European Micromorphus are in need of revision, the distribution of most species is poorly known.
